name: Leave it Brie
description:
Play as Doctor Colby Brie, a vigilante God hunter who's found their last target in an abandoned house. 

Controls : 

Left Click or Spacebar to progress dialogue.

Special thanks to my favorite Eldritch horror,  Statia, who made the music, crafted the story and gave us lots of support along the way! <3

Submission to the Cosmic Horror Jam 2022 hosted by Dungeon.
